docs.lead_paragraph: AT its annual "Winter meeting, held last week in Boston, the American Association for the Advancement of Science roamed as usual through the vast universe, contemplating stars and atoms, dinosaurs and microbes, in an all-embracing sweep of its scientific eye.

headline.main: THE WEEK IN SCIENCE: TAKING AN INVENTORY

docs.abstract: Comment on R L Kahn's theory on immunizing power of the skin
